message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is worth $150 to you. I am willing to sell it to you for $140. I believe this is a great opportunity for both of us.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to sell it to you for $135. This is my best offer.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. However, I was really hoping to get closer to my target price of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at $132?
I see, Bob. Thank you for your persistence. After considering your latest offer, I am willing to sell the product to you for $133. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short of my target price. Would you be willing to meet me at $131?
I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to sell the product to you for $132. This is my final offer.
